customer_reviews.title: Great products and customer support.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking blood pressure meds for the last fifteen years. After taking Ancestral Heart supplement for a few weeks I am already seeing improvement. My readings were usually around 128/89. Now I am 115/83. That is in just a few weeks and taking only one or two caps a day. I am hoping within time to stop my prescribed medicine. I wrote to Brian about my blood pressure and also about my golden retriever who has recently been diagnosed with cutaneous lymphoma. He wrote back to me the next day with some suggestions and encouragement. Wonderful customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Heart Felt!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Ancestral Supplement "Lifer" !!!!........your products are amazing and have given me a new push to stay healthy. My gym time is better and more productive which means my days are better and better! I can't believe how much money I spent on the latest and greatest OTC supplements to gain the edge as well as keep the edge. I believe that I have bought everything and currently in the process of purchasing a few more that I think will complete my regiment. These have been life-changing for me and I will continue to buy to become better. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Fatigue and joint pain gone
customer_reviews.text: I have felt a lot more sustained energy throughout the day, in workouts, and especially upon waking in the morning. I no longer need to drink a cup of coffee or grab a zero cal Bang energy drink at the store. Also joint support has been much better. With this COVID lock down I have had to completely change my cardio workouts from a stair stepper after lifting weights to running up to 4 miles, and after about 2 weeks of that new shock to my knees they flared up making it extremely painful to run. Those issues have gone away, and I haven’t had an issue running everyday
customer_reviews.author: Sean Loury

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I am an adamant supplement user and Ancestral Supplements is by far one of my favorite companies. The supplements work as advertised & the customer service is phenomenal. I currently take Beef Heart, which has lowered my blood pressure & left me with a better sense of well-being. I just ordered Beef Organs & Beef Bone Marrow so I am looking forward to reaping the awesome benefits of these great supplements!
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: I love Ancestral Supplements and my dog does too.
customer_reviews.text: I love Ancestral Supplements and my dog does too. I use them every day and will continue to. I am on the Keto diet and beef organs are an excellent supplement to take that ensure I am getting all the nutrition I need. I also feed them to my dog in his wet food. He also seems to be feeling better and loves the taste of beef organ powder in his food.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the beef heart. Very good for coq10, etc. I do get more energy when I use it. I don’t need very large dosages so I only do this one once every other day. I also use the liver and spleen ones too.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: There aren't enough stars to adequately convey how much I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Ancestral Grassfed Beef Supplements are a lifesaver--I'm not being hyperbolic. I was really drained mentally, physically and emotionally before I started using these products. As of right now I use Grass Fed Beef Heart, Grass Fed Beef Collagen, Grass Fed Beef Organs and Grass Fed Beef Thyroid; all of which have shown immediate results. I can't extol these products enough, I implore you to try them if you want to improve your overall health. I started out with low doses, and was exclusively on Grass Fed Beef Heart for two weeks before I started exploring adding other ancestral supplements! Find what works for you, but I promise that your life will change with these products.
customer_reviews.author: kindle

customer_reviews.title: Works FAST!
customer_reviews.text: I have started taking the liver and heart for myself and my skin has noticed a drastic improvement . I have also dropped my desiccated thyroid dose in half!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: These WORK
customer_reviews.text: I was told by my doctors that I will have heart problems my whole life. I believed them for a while, but stopped later on in life. I started focusing on my health and saw significant improvements in my heart functions over the past few years. I stumbled upon these products and decided to gice them a try. I am seriously impressed. I've noticed incredible levels of energy, and have consistently been burning 1000+ active calories because i've had insane levels of energy. My palpatations are now almost non-existent, and I'm confident that adding these supplements to my daily regimine will reverse my issues. I LOVE these products.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielnewkirk5

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work for my arthritis
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to help my arthritis. However, I cannot take the recommended 6 pills for the full dose. 2-3 is my limit. I have a digestion problem and the capsules seem to get stuck it I take more than this.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Haley

customer_reviews.title: Helps me have peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: My mom was hospitalized a few years ago with a pulmonary embolism! She’s been fairly healthy all of her life and all of a sudden she gets this pulmonary embolism. I take this to help my blood flow smoothly which only benefits me as a training athlete too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Nichols RD LD

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: I haven't measured the effectiveness of the beef heart supplement by numbers, but I cannot deny that my heart feels like its working more efficiently. It gives me a similar feeling to when I ate beets on a regular basis. No spike in heart rate when a loud noise comes out of nowhere or a car swerving near me or whatever other situation that would normally cause angst. I believe I'll always have this in my repertoire.
customer_reviews.author: Jburn

customer_reviews.title: Nutritional Foundation
customer_reviews.text: I really have enjoyed the supplements so far but the effects are kind of hard to explain. I just seem to feel better since I started taking them and I seem to have a little more energy but not in the energy supplement way....if that makes sense. My sleep has also been better and waking up in the morning has been easier than it has been for a while. I will definitely be ordering more in the future. Food cravings during the day have gone way down and my joints feel better than they have in years.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: CoQ10
customer_reviews.text: I know you have all seen CoQ10 supplement at every supermarket. Most of which are synthetically made. The heart is loaded with high levels of CoQ10 which makes this supplement the best option for getting CoQ10 into your body. CoQ10 is one of the few great nutrients in beef heart!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Haning

customer_reviews.title: No racing heart
customer_reviews.text: I start 2 days ago and already have better heart palpitations. No racing heart anymore. Sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: An elegant nose-to-tail solution
customer_reviews.text: Sourcing and cooking heart is a pain in the butt for me, but I do appreciate the nutritional value of consuming heart (and nose to tail in general) on a regular basis. This is a super easy way to cover my nutritional bases while eating a mostly muscle meat diet. Heart is a great source of COQ10 and I believe that I am supporting my own heart by consuming the heart of a healthy animal. Easy to swallow pills, no chalky burp-ups or burning in throat feeling I would get from taking a bunch of synthetic vitamin pills.
customer_reviews.author: Brianmkandrew

customer_reviews.title: BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I emailed Ancestral Supplements about a damaged bottle I recently received. Not only did they respond immediately, but they issued a full refund and sent a replacement free of charge. I loved them before but I love them even more now. Awesome products and even more awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.author: BigDogMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking the liver, beef organs and bone marrow about a month and a half ago and recently added the collagen and beef heart products. I really like that they are natural without all the BS. I also know that liver and beef organs are very good for you but can’t find an organic source for meat. My thyroid has always been on the “low normal” side so I thought I’d try your thyroid product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Laplante

customer_reviews.title: Really helps Respiratory Issues
customer_reviews.text: Love the heart because I found its a game changer for respiratory issues and energy. Thanks to Brian for all his help in answering my questions and doing all he can to advance health and well-being. Very happy and satisfied Ancestral Supplements customer!
customer_reviews.author: queenlalis

customer_reviews.title: No benefit for me
customer_reviews.text: I took it for heart palpitations, but it did nothing to alleviate my symptoms. I didn't feel any change in my body.
customer_reviews.author: K.N.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased your liver and heart product. I started by taking a couple myself and was amazed how great I felt. I have a 10 year old daughter with down syndrome who has been struggling with her health. She has been dealing with mitochondria dysfunction and the transports of fats, We have been doing the Gaps diet for a couple of years but she is still very deficient due to the lack of carnitine that we recently discovered through an Oats test. She was also very deficient in D and B vitamins. I have been giving her a half a capsule of liver and started with a sprinkle of heart yesterday and have seen great improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Quality nutrition
customer_reviews.text: I understand the nutritional value of eating “nose to tail”, especially organs. When I can’t access fresh, I rely on Ancestral Supplements, especially kidney, brain and heart for the nutrients needed for my health. I empty the capsules because they are hard for me to swallow, and they taste surprisingly good. I’m impressed by the quality of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using your products for the past six months. I use beef organs, heart, and prostate. Along with exercise and dietary changes, I have seen great results. I recently have had blood pressure medicine reduced am no longer pre diabetic and no longer have fatty liver. My last health concern deals with my kidneys.
customer_reviews.author: eugene brown

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Love all this company does - they're amazing all around from their products to customer service. I purchased all their products a few months ago and they were superb.. certainly helped a lot w/ some of my issues. Try it - you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mohsan Khan

customer_reviews.title: Head to tail is the way to go...
customer_reviews.text: I do have more energy and better mental acuity. I have been breaking them open and adding them to my green shakes in the mornings (can’t take all I do have more energy and better mental acuity. I have been breaking them open and adding them to my green shakes in the mornings (can’t take all those capsules). My skin and hair and nails have never looked better.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great supplements - wonderful company!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been concentrating on the beef heart and the magnesium oil at this time. Even though I also bought beef tallow and cartilage, I don’t like to try too many new supplements at once. If I have a problem I won’t know which one is the issue. That being said I believe I have seen a decrease in my angina pain since taking the heart supplement and magnesium oil.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: They have helped my PVCs
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking the heart pills for about a week, just one in the morning and one in the evening. My palps have all but stopped so far. But I did at the same time get rid of my liquid magnesium and electrolytes. I feel so much better. I do want to add more beef heart daily, but I am doing this gradually. I love the products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doberman health
customer_reviews.text: I am trying glandular therapy with my loving doberman who was just diagnosed with DCM. I have him on bone marrow, trachea, liver, organs, lung,heart and thymus. I want to get him on spleen and kidney also. Trying to reverse CHF...we shall see how my furry friend does. He's 5 almost 6 and my best friend. I am also taking thymus for some allergies and lymph swelling along with the other supplements. I really believe in this type of therapy and hope to prolong my dobies life.
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Lower Blood Pressure
customer_reviews.text: So far, since taking the Heart, Lung and Beef Organs... 2-3 of each daily for a couple of months, my blood pressure has gone way down, it's normal (in the 120's) or only slightly elevated... I'm really happy about that!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Getting my CoQ10
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying most of this company’s supplements and I got great information from their website about CoQ10 in heart organs. Good for cellular energy production. Others were way more expensive. I’m looking forward to using these as the other products from this company are high quality and effective
customer_reviews.author: EddieB

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: I am currently taking a little of everything you produce and LOVE them all. Sometimes, If I have to go out around lunch and have not time to eat, I just take a handful of everything (especially the liver) and I'm good-to-go for a very long time :)) Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Company!
customer_reviews.text: Heart disease runs in my family. When I first heard about Ancestral Supplements all natural grass fed beef heart products it sounded like a perfect solution. I've always heard about the long term benefits of eating beef heart and now that AS provides it in a clean pill form, it is so easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Almost a year now and are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been taking this as part of a larger supplement plan for over a year and are very happy. We are not the biggest fans of the heart and liver but Brian "The Liver King" has made it painless and easy. The best reference is the website since it is PACKED with lots of good info. The about is section takes a while to get through, and his journey isn't for everyone there are plenty of ideas for everyone to consider since everyone has a different body and likes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hindes

customer_reviews.title: Safe and effective alternatives to good health vs drugs
customer_reviews.text: Husband has started using the Heart supplement after undergoing the procedure for stent placement. We trust in the product as a natural method to strengthen and maintain his heart vs the very expensive pharmaceutical drugs doctors want to put you on. They all have massive lists involving serious side effects. We are thankful to have safe alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie C.

customer_reviews.title: Truly life-changing supplements!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so very much for the response! Yes I am a current customer and am currently taking lung, liver and heart! I feel great, I Vaped regularly last year and started to notice shortness of breath and difficulty drawing a deep gasping Breath. I did a little research on your products and thought the three I purchased would help and they definitely did.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Like treats like... but didn't flip my heart.
customer_reviews.text: I have a congenital heart defect, so I purchased this thinking it would correct my backwards heart. My heart is still backwards, but this Beef Heart is EPIC. Did you really think it would magically spin my heart around? Boosts of energy during workouts, lower BP throughout the day, especially when my kids are stressing me out. Good stuff, go get ya some.
customer_reviews.author: I like lamp

customer_reviews.title: Love these products
customer_reviews.text: The beef heart and marrow has been fantastic! I stopped for a few days to see if I can notice a difference, and it does really help, especially with pain, anxiety, and eye pressure. Even my spine pain feels better. I'm ordering brain next, I'm hoping it'll help treat the neuro Lyme Disease I still suffer from. After studying human nutrition for a natural science gen ed, I've been trying to develop a system that works for my problems that I can pass onto others, mainly in the realms of nutrition, tcm, ayurveda, aromatherapy, etc. It seems you're on a similar journey.
customer_reviews.author: MarshLight

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Hi Brian! I love your products. After a lot of research I realized that taking your supplements was a far superior way of getting so many critical vitamins from iron to coQ10... much better than pills and seriously I have zero clue how I would 1. Source the raw organs and 2. Prepare then so they are edible... I am Scottish decent so recipes of Haggis come to mind ... ah-hem the freeze dried pills are fabulous! Keep up the awesome work! Stay well! Lauriejean
customer_reviews.author: lauriejean chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Beef organs are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Currently my library consists of 1) brain 2) heart 3)thymus 4) liver 5) intestine 6) tallow 7)prostate 8) collagen and adding 9) spleen. I've been taking a concoction of 6 caplets at a time in the morning. Usually one of each from six supplements at random. Sometimes I will pop a few at lunch. It is working, my physique looks much stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SCAM
customer_reviews.text: Just the amount of pills they want you to take speak volume. I wouldnt be suprised their all sugar pills. NO Benefits, just waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great for Energy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 23 year old son who had three BP readings that were high. I ordered for him and he said within two days, he noticed he had increased energy. Will update this review after his physical. He's in the service, so he does get BP readings quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Minniejack

product_meta.title: Ancestral Supplements Grass Fed Beef Heart (Desiccated) — Natural CoQ10, Supports Heart, Mitochondrial and Blood Pressure Health (180 Capsules)
feature_bullets: Based on the concept "like supports like," consuming heart supports our own heart *
Heart is the richest source of naturally occurring coenzyme Q10 (CoQ10) *
Supports heart and blood pressure health — also a nutritional powerhouse for mitochondria *
Recommended as an integral part of a nose-to-tail keto or carnivore diet by Paul Saladino, MD (author of The Carnivore Code)
